commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.summary: Match invocation method from Shell Script bundle
commits.body: This adds a <kbd class='tabTrigger'>swift⇥</kbd> shebang snippet to work in any document and enhances the <kbd class='tabTrigger'>env⇥</kbd> snippet when used in a swift document. The snippets will only fire when used at the very beginning of a document.

commits.author: nemesit

Add TextMate.save_if_untitled('swift'), chang the ruby shebang, and make the run command itself more generic.

Signed-off-by: nemesit <nemesit@myriadvisuals.com>
